nodes.text: This non-canon spin-off source of the original Quest for Quasar stated that one of the characters, Lord Baltharog, was 1.89 meters tall. Quest for Quasar fan Groz Niclari, who went by the nickname "QuasarKing327," collected almost 1.5 million signatures on a HoloNet petition to have 1.84-meter-tall actor Harlan Ottekvar replaced in Myris Pictures's holofilm adaption of Quest for Quasar. Some fans pointed out that Baltharog's height came from this source and was therefore not canon.
